title: Direct Hire - LifeLink
html: Direct Hire
description: Direct Hire Jobs Behind Every Great Patient Outcome, There’s a Great Team. Direct hire careers in healthcare Direct hire jobs are an excellent option if you are looking for a full-time job as a staff nurse or a healthcare professional. At Lifelink Healthcare Staffing, we match you with employers in need of committed and skilled staff, allowing you to find the right permanent job with longevity and stability. Direct hire and temp to perm jobs offer the chance to gain experience in different specialties and the opportunity to establish your medical career. As one of the top healthcare staffing agencies in the United States, Lifelink has the best jobs for nurses and healthcare professionals at acute care and rehab hospitals, physician offices, assisted living facilities, schools, and more! Learn More https://lifelinkhealthtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/direct-hire2-1.mp4 Lifelink Healthcare Staffing can help you find the perfect direct hire career to fit your professional needs and lifestyle. Our dedicated placement consultants assess your individual career goals and ambitions to understand exactly what kind of job best suits your skill set and experience level. With access to exclusive healthcare facilities nationwide, Lifelink has opportunities for registered nurses, nurse practitioners, nurse anesthetists, licensed practical nurses, certified nursing assistants, medical assistants, front and back-office staff, and a wide range of allied health roles. Apply with Lifelink today and let us show you how we can help you find your dream career in healthcare. Learn More https://lifelinkhealthtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/direct-hire3-1.mp4 Applying has never been easier! Meet Frankie Frankie, Lifelink Healthcare Staffing’s virtual assistant, helps healthcare professionals through our application process. Once you click the ‘apply’ button, Frankie will guide you through the application by asking you questions and automatically submitting your information, ensuring a hassle-free experience. Find Your Dream Travel Nurse Assignment With our new chat bot, you’ll be able to quickly apply for a permanent full-time or part-time job and easily create your profile with Lifelink in a matter of minutes. Our streamlined application process helps experienced nursing, allied health, and non-clinical professionals find the job of their dreams with Lifelink. Apply Today Talent solutions for all your part-time, full-time, and temp to perm needs At Lifelink Healthcare Staffing, we understand that full-time direct hire and temp to perm options are an affordable way of counteracting staffing shortages. Our recruitment and talent solutions are designed to achieve optimal outcomes including improved fill rates, decreased time to hire, reduced early-stage turnover, and minimized administrative effort. For over four decades, we have served the healthcare staffing industry with commitment and personalized solutions, helping countless organizations fill their open positions quickly without sacrificing quality. Learn More https://lifelinkhealthtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/direct-hire4.mp4 Talent solutions for all your staffing needs At Lifelink Healthcare Staffing, we understand that full-time, part-time, and temp-to-perm direct hire options are an affordable way to help counteract staffing shortages. Our recruitment process and talent solutions are designed to achieve optimal outcomes. With Lifelink, you’ll experience improved fill rates, decreased time to hire, reduced early-stage turnover, and minimized administrative effort.  For over four decades, Lifelink has served the healthcare staffing industry with commitment and personalized solutions. We are proud to have helped countless organizations fill their open positions quickly without sacrificing quality.   Learn More https://lifelinkhealthtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/direct-hire5.mp4 Lifelink Healthcare Staffing offers a variety of positions that will solve all your direct hire needs. Whether you’re looking for a skilled physician assistant or a medical receptionist, Lifelink has you covered. Explore the many nursing and allied health roles we staff below: Advanced practice nurses (APRN), including physician assistants (PA) and nurse practitioners (NP) Certified registered nurse anesthetist Registered nurses (RN), licensed practical nurses (LPN) / licensed vocational nurses (LVN) Certified nursing assistants (CNA) Physical therapists (PT), occupational therapists (OT), and speech language pathologists (SLP) Allied health professionals including medical assistants (MA) and certified surgical techs (CST) Department and unit managers Office managers and medical receptionists Learn More https://lifelinkhealthtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/direct-hire6-1.mp4 Lifelink specializes in direct hire, temp to perm, and temporary staffing solutions. We have the experience, commitment, and resources to help you staff your facility and stay competitive. Hire with ease, expertise, and confidence when you choose Lifelink Healthcare Staffing. See the wide range of facilities we staff at below: Outpatient physician offices Assisted living facilities, nursing homes, and rehab hospitals Acute care hospitals and surgery centers Home health and hospice Drug and alcohol treatment facilities Behavioral health facilities Development disability programs Schools Youth shelters Telehealth Learn More https://lifelinkhealthtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/direct-hire7-1.mp4 Executive-level nursing and healthcare professional services Lifelink Healthcare Staffing provides professional, specialized assistance to companies that are seeking to hire executive level employees in the healthcare industry. With our recruiting process, we are able to help identify and hire qualified employees at any level. We have extensive experience in sourcing, selecting, recruiting and placing individuals in the executive roles of Chief Medical Officers, Chief Nurse Officers and Clinical Department Managers. Our skill and attention to detail provides employers with peace of mind that they will be able to hire the right candidates with the correct qualifications and skill set to meet the role’s requirements.  Learn More https://lifelinkhealthtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/direct-hire8-1.mp4 Recruitment process outsourcing (RPO) Lifelink Healthcare Staffing is the premier provider of direct hire recruitment services with proven results in reducing costs, decreasing time-to-fill, and improving new hire retention rates. Our expert recruiters have a proven track record of delivering cost savings on average of 24%, an average 45% reduction in the time needed to fill positions, and an impressive 55% increase in new hire retention. At Lifelink, our commitment to exceeding customer expectations has made us a leader in the staffing industry for over 40 years. By working closely with our healthcare clients, we are able to offer customized solutions to fill a wide variety of nursing and allied health needs ensuring that your expectations are exceeded every time.  Learn More https://lifelinkhealthtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/direct-hire9-1.mp4 My Staff Need Referral Program Help someone find a job and earn rewards in the process.
